original_text: you must certainly put to the sword all who live in that town. You must destroy it completely, both its people and its livestock.
korean_text: 너는 마땅히 그 성읍 주민을 칼날로 죽이고 그 성읍과 그 가운데에 거주하는 모든 것과 그 가축을 칼날로 진멸하고

sentences.original_text: you must certainly put to the sword
all who live in that town
both its people and its livestock
